long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gmail unformatter lets you know when you are using formatting on your email and gives you the ability to clear all formats with the click of a button. Don't be embarrassed by copying and pasting an email ever again.
